= Business Objectives For Process:=

This section describes the business objectives for the Automated Exam System project. Our objectives come to our minds from real problem that many teachers  or schools face continually. The problem is that teachers have many classes and a huge numbers of students as a result they do not have much time to make many different kinds of exams.Thus, the system have ability to make exams process is more convince and much easily than traditional method in the past. Saving time is one of the highest priority to design this system. Beside that our system could convert making exams from boring thing to easy and interesting thing for our stakeholders.
